channel.description: Sign a user out from all SAML SSO apps Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 657 Is this a new page?: Existing doc: changes are needed to update the doc and to fit the new IA Target personas: Internal app builders, Saas Builder Changes to be made: Split out the OIDC/SAML page dimension into separate guides Update title Links to original docs: Configure Single Logout: https://developer.
